article.title: Building the new Hopper.com
article.author: Dennis Brotzky
article.excerpt: Creating a new website for Hopper, one of the top 4 most downloaded travel apps in the U.S, along with Uber, Lyft.

node.title: Understanding the Gatsby lifecycle
node.author: Dennis Brotzky
node.excerpt: With the growing community interest in Gatsby, we hope to create more resources that make it easier for anyone to grasp the power of this incredible tool.
